channel.title: Client Freezes
channel.description:
So before we updated the client certain people were complaining about the client freezing. We updated but nothing was changed that I thought would affect freezing in any way, shape or form but certain people claim it's resolved but equally as many are now saying the client freezes but it didn't with the old version. No output what-so-ever, the applet just freezes. Now I've never experienced this on any client version but after formatting I now freeze all the time. I then formatted again and it resolved it... I can't replicate the problem to try and resolve it.
Anyone with in depth client knowledge got any suggestions on how to reduce freezes?
Oh and also, when I push CTRL + ALT + DEL on Windows 7 Ultimate the client freezes.

item.title: Client Freezes
item.dc:creator: @Miles1 Miles`
item.description:
@Miles1 wrote:

My client freezes aswell on any server when this happens.

Read full topic

item.title: Client Freezes
item.dc:creator: @The_Enforcer The Enforcer
item.description:
@The_Enforcer wrote:

[quote=“Kryptix, post:1, topic:358815”][quote author=dimebagx link=topic=455258.msg3333579#msg3333579 date=1283697525]
I think in RSCE, it’s possibly camera/teleporting based, whenever I froze it was when I went through a portal to teleport holding the camera left or right button, i have a habbit of that
[/quote]
I’ve frozen on pretty much every server I’ve ever been on, I can also make EasyRSC freeze by pushing CTRL + ALT + DEL.[/quote]

Wish I could freeze clients like you. Pro sauce.

Read full topic
